p: Amongst the seven antiviral drugs, Ritonavir showed the highest binding energy (-7.45 kcal/mol) and lowest inhibitory constant K i value (3.49 µM). Ritonavir produced hydrogen bond interactions with Thr26, His41 and Cys145 SARS-CoV-2 amino acids (Fig. 7c). A combination of two HIV-1 protease inhibitors, lopinavir and ritonavir, were given to critically ill SARS-CoV 2 infected patients [ 48]. However, the combination therapy of lopinavir and ritonavir was also stopped early in 13 patients (total recruitment 99 patients) due to associated gastrointestinal adverse events [ 48].
